description: Enjutsu Kouro is a selfish and manipulative noble in Shin Koihime Musou who doesn`t care about the plight of her people. She conned Enshou into giving her Ryuubi`s sword in exchange for an "extremely rare robe that idiot`s can`t see". However she herself was conned by Shuri into returning the sword to Ryuubi in exchange for some "concoction".
name: Enjutsu Kouro
